INICIO.TEXTO.UNO: I am a self-taught programmer with a strong interest in technology. I dedicate myself to constantly studying and improving my skills.
INICIO.TEXTO.DOS: I enjoy solving problems and facing challenges that allow me to grow as a developer. Programming is my daily motivation and drives me to keep learning.
PROYECTOS.BACCO.TEXTO: The Bacco Coffee project was my final delivery for the JavaScript course at Coderhouse. It's a minimalist website that includes a simple and efficient shopping cart.
PROYECTOS.EMOJIS.TEXTO: This is a React+Vite application that allows you to search and find emojis quickly through a JSON file, showing relevant results in real-time.
PROYECTOS.PELIS.TEXTO: This website consumes an API to allow users to search and obtain detailed information about movies. Additionally, it has an intuitive and easy-to-use interface.
PROYECTOS.COLORES.TEXTO: Website that uses a specialized library to generate a wide variety of color palettes.
PROYECTOS.SUSCRIPCIONES.TEXTO: Subscription budget management application that allows you to easily control your expenses on services like Netflix, HBO, and many more.
PROYECTOS.TRANSF.TEXTO: This transfer app guides the user step by step. Enter the amount to transfer, verify the details, select the method, and confirm the operation. Easy, fast, and secure.
